alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Doniphan, northern Atchison, western Buchanan, Atchison, Holt, western Nodaway and western Andrew Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tarkio to near Forest City to near Everest. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Atchison, Savannah, Tarkio, Wathena, Mound City, Highland, Troy, Rock Port, Oregon, Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Maitland, Amazonia, Rushville, Lancaster, Skidmore, Forest City, Craig and Fillmore. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 57 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
